org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.core

Interface ZBSerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteArrayOutputStreamSerializer, DefaultSerializer

    public interface ZBSerializer
    The interface for helping the serialization ZCL frame on array of byte
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

      • appendZigBeeType

        void appendZigBeeType(java.lang.Object data,
                    ZigBeeType type)
        Parameters:
        data - Object containing the value to append
        type - ZigBeeType to select of data has to be appended
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • appendString

        void appendString(java.lang.String str)
        Append a String to the stream by prefixing it with the length of the String itself
        as specified by the ZigBee Cluster Library (Document 075123r01ZB
        Parameters:
        str - the String to append
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the String is greater then 255
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • appendObject

        void appendObject(java.lang.Object data)
        Deprecated. Use appendZigBeeType(Object, ZigBeeType) instead
        Since version 0.4.0 the method must not used, use appendZigBeeType(Object, ZigBeeType) instead.
        This method has a conceptual bug in respect to appending 8, 16, or 24 bit long data, in fact
        the methods can only fail in such cases.
        Parameters:
        data - Object to serialize as Java type
